summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ghana Pharmacy Network feature. All 44 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend Pharmacy Directory page loads correctly with all features working: stats cards, search, filters (NHIS, 24-hour, delivery), tabs (Directory, Chains, By Region), and pharmacy details dialog.
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - using existing SEED_PHARMACIES list with 133 pharmacies in pharmacy_network_module.py
context_for_next_testing_agent: Ghana Pharmacy Network feature is fully functional. Backend API endpoints at /api/pharmacy-network/* are working correctly. Frontend at /pharmacy-directory requires authentication (use super admin: ygtnetworks@gmail.com / test123). All 133 pharmacies across 16 Ghana regions are accessible. Chains (Ernest Chemist 17 locations, mPharma 7 locations, Kinapharma 5 locations) are displayed correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/pharmacy-network/pharmacies - lists all pharmacies with pagination
GET /api/pharmacy-network/regions/Greater Accra/pharmacies - returns 55 pharmacies in Greater Accra
GET /api/pharmacy-network/ownership-types - returns 7 ownership types (ghs, private_hospital, retail, wholesale, chain, mission, quasi_government)
GET /api/pharmacy-network/chains - returns Ernest Chemist (17), mPharma (7), Kinapharma (5)
GET /api/pharmacy-network/pharmacies/{id} - returns pharmacy details (tested with GHS-GA-001)
Frontend: Pharmacy Directory page loads with stats cards
Frontend: Search functionality filters pharmacies correctly
Frontend: Chains tab displays all 3 chains with locations
Frontend: By Region tab displays all 16 regions with pharmacy counts
Frontend: Pharmacy details dialog shows complete information
